languages.text: "Мои ошибки вывели меня на дорогу, ведущую в бездну. Если такова плата за истину... я шагну во тьму не страшась".
"My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."
languages.original_text: "Мои ошибки вывели меня на дорогу, ведущую в бездну. Если такова плата за истину... я шагну во тьму не страшась".

traits.locale_text: "My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我犯下的错误，让我踏上了通往深渊的道路。如果这就是我需要为真相付出的代价……那我愿意毫无畏惧，步入黑暗。”
languages.original_text: "My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."

traits.locale_text: “我犯下的错误，让我踏上了通往深渊的道路。如果这就是我需要为真相付出的代价……那我愿意毫无畏惧，步入黑暗。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les erreurs que j'ai commises m'ont mené sur la voie des abysses. Si tel est le prix à payer pour la vérité... alors je m'enfoncerai dans les ténèbres sans rechigner. »
languages.original_text: "My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."

traits.locale_text: « Les erreurs que j'ai commises m'ont mené sur la voie des abysses. Si tel est le prix à payer pour la vérité... alors je m'enfoncerai dans les ténèbres sans rechigner. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Mis errores me condujeron al camino que lleva al abismo. Si ese es el precio que debo pagar por saber la verdad... entraré sin miedo en las tinieblas».
languages.original_text: "My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."

traits.locale_text: «Mis errores me condujeron al camino que lleva al abismo. Si ese es el precio que debo pagar por saber la verdad... entraré sin miedo en las tinieblas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「私の過ちが、深遠へと続く道に私を運んだのだ。真実の代償を払わなくてはならないなら…私は恐れず闇へ踏み出そう」
languages.original_text: "My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."

traits.locale_text: 「私の過ちが、深遠へと続く道に私を運んだのだ。真実の代償を払わなくてはならないなら…私は恐れず闇へ踏み出そう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Fehler haben mich auf die Straße zum Abgrund geführt. Wenn das der Preis ist, den ich für die Wahrheit bezahlen muss ... dann trete ich ohne Furcht in die Dunkelheit."
languages.original_text: "My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Fehler haben mich auf die Straße zum Abgrund geführt. Wenn das der Preis ist, den ich für die Wahrheit bezahlen muss ... dann trete ich ohne Furcht in die Dunkelheit."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."

languages.text: "Hatalarım beni boşluğa giden yola getirdi. Hakikat için ödemem gereken bedel buysa... Karanlığa korkmadan atlarım."
languages.original_text: "My mistakes brought me to the road that leads to the abyss. If that is the price I must pay for the truth... I will step into the darkness without fear."

traits.locale_text: "Hatalarım beni boşluğa giden yola getirdi. Hakikat için ödemem gereken bedel buysa... Karanlığa korkmadan atlarım."
